subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Blog all should read and beware of...
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I find this whole thing kind of humorous for some reason. Maybe that's 
just me. Maybe if I weren't so detached from the scene, it might look more 
serious.

Chris Moon refers to "public slander".  Where has this supposedly taken 
place?  I don't have hours and hours to spend looking at everything on 
internet and in fact it's tough sometimes just keeping up with the e-mails 
I get from 60 Yahoogroups and about 20 other groups (mostly related to 
amateur radio and photography and a small handful having to do with the 
paranormal).

Zack

On Thu, 3 Jan 2008, LC Duplatt wrote:

> http://blog.myspace.com/index.cfm?
> fuseaction=blog.view&friendID=43481649&blogID=343715947
>
